title: Guided Meditation for Self Love 💗
description:
Cultivate more self love, self confidence & self worth with this 12 minute guided meditation with positive affirmations. Download the audio to this self love meditation → https://www.lavendaire.com/meditation-self-love

This meditation includes full body relaxation, self love affirmations, gratitude and energy visualization exercises. Great for beginners and all levels.

channelDescription:
Hi, I'm Aileen! Lavendaire is a channel about personal growth & lifestyle design, where I share knowledge and inspiration on creating your dream life. ✨

Here you'll find content on: self development, intentional living, self love, habits, healing, mindset, guided meditations, positive affirmations, & more.

Lavendaire is for the dreamers who believe. For those who are smart, curious, and conscious, with an open mind, a love for learning, and a deep desire to live a brilliant and vibrant life.

In short, Lavendaire is for the artist of life.

//  Life is an art. Make it your masterpiece.  //

comments: ✨ Ready to transform your life in 2025? ✨ The Artist of Life Workbook is your personal guide to setting goals, finding clarity, and creating the life you want. Start your journey here: https://lavendaire.com/workbook 🌟

15 mins ago I was questioning my self worth, crying myself to death, writing my farewell letter..
Suddenly something in me tells to open youtube and search for self affirmation and healing.. clicked this video and now I AM GOING TO CHOOSE LOVE OVER FEAR.

Adding this to my everyday routine.
To the beautiful soul reading this: You are valued. You are loved. You are so, so worthy 💗
I cried. Thanks for this Aileen <3

I honestly started crying, ive been so harsh on myself, with all that negative self talk. This felt more like someone telling me that i should be nicer to myself in best way possible, than a meditation
